features.title: Features of payment for excursions
features.noPrepayment: ✓ No prepayments. We work without prepayment for group excursions. You pay for the program on the bus or during the tour. Prepayment may be required only when ordering a program from 5 people ($5 per person, on some programs) and individual excursions or programs for which you need to buy plane tickets or draw up documents. Other excursions can be paid directly during the transfer or at the venue;
features.convenientMethods: ✓ Convenient payment methods. You do not have to look for someone to pay for the tour. A representative of the organizer on site will inform you about the need to pay. You can pay for the program in cash-in dollars (banknotes not earlier than 2000), euros or Egyptian pounds. Prepayment for individual excursions and programs for which you need to buy plane tickets can also be made in cash to the organizer's representative. To make it come to you, contact our booking department in any convenient messenger,
features.nonCashPayment: ✓ Possibility of non-cash payment. For your convenience, we have provided the opportunity to make a transfer of an advance payment or the full cost of the program to the bank cards of the organizers in rubles, tenge, hryvnia or euros, with a small commission indicated on the main page of our website. You can also transfer payments in USDT to a crypto wallet with no fees. To clarify the details, please contact the reservation department.

refund.title: Refund of prepayment for excursion programs
refund.conditions: The organizer will fully refund your prepayment if: You paid it in cash or by transfer to a bank card, and the tour did not take place through the fault of the organizer; You canceled the program more than a day before the date of the tour.
refund.exception: The exception is programs that require plane tickets. In such cases, the organizer will not be able to return the prepayment after the purchase of air tickets.
refund.process: The prepayment can be returned in cash or to a bank card in rubles at the exchange rate on the day of the refund, or at the rate that was set on the day when the prepayment was transferred to the bank card. Refunds are made within 3 calendar days.

obligations.title: What to do if the organizers do not properly fulfill their obligations
obligations.intro: If the program does not correspond to the description on the website or the organizer has provided a service of inadequate quality, you must:
obligations.step1: 1- Be sure to take a video and photo confirmation of the controversial situation;
obligations.step2: 2- At the place of the tour, ask the guide or accompanying person to contact his management,
obligations.step3: 3- Ask/demand to correct the situation or a full/partial refund of the tour price;
obligations.step4: 4- Immediately on the spot, write to the Albatross Travel Egypt Tourist Reservation and Escort Department, tell about the details of what is happening, send media files confirming the information provided.
obligations.resolution: This is the only way we can help in resolving the conflict and influence the organizer of the program immediately in the process of the tour, through the guidance of the organizers. As a rule, they do everything to resolve disputes as soon as possible and settle all issues on the spot.
obligations.recommendation: Therefore, we always recommend that you have a smartphone with active Internet with you on excursions in order to minimize possible shortcomings on the part of the organizers' employees in your favor, we are interested in this.
obligations.alternatives:
• Alternative ways to resolve the situation are possible:
Discount on the next excursion; Gift;
• Free guided tour.
obligations.caseByCase: In each case, compensation is discussed on a case-by-case basis.
obligations.afterTour: If you have written to our reservation department after the end of the tour and want to request a discount, full or partial refund of the amount paid to the organizer, you must fulfill the points below:
obligations.requirement1: ▲ Write to our reservation department and report the discrepancy between the completed program and the one described on our website; be sure to attach a video confirmation of the claim, where the non-compliance of the completed program will be visible;
obligations.requirement2: ▲ If there are no video files and it is not possible to fulfill the point above, you need: Write an application for a refund in free form, with a detailed statement of the non-compliance of the program (print); send a photo of the application with your signature and date; attach similar statements from two other tourists who are with you on the tour, who made the booking of the program separately from you (two separate bookings), with their phone numbers in the WhatsApp messenger and information in which company they booked the tour;
obligations.requirement3: ▲ Wait for the application to be considered by the organizer's management and confirmation of the refund (up to 7 calendar days); receive a refund in cash in dollars or to a bank card in rubles, hryvnias, tenge or euros at the exchange rate on the day of the refund, or at the rate that was set on the day when the payment was transferred to the organizer's bank card.
obligations.disclaimer: Our online service is not an authorized person for refunds for excursions. You pay for the programs directly to the organizers of the excursions during the transfer at the venue or by transfer to a bank card; You do not have any trade and monetary relations with us. We provide free information support and necessary assistance, staying in touch every day from 07:30 to 23:00 Cairo time. In order to resolve the situation in your favor, we need supporting media materials (video/photos) to provide them to the management of the organizers. Albatross Travel Egypt is interested in resolving all conflict situations between tourists and tour organizers as soon as possible. We do our best to ensure that holidays in Egypt bring only positive emotions and vivid memories.
